name: Monitoring and tracing
description: Make APIM traffic observable via consistent logging, metrics, and correlation.
topics: Define correlation strategy (request IDs, traceparent) and propagate to backends.
Capture gateway-level latency and backend latency separately where possible.
Use policies to emit custom metrics/events when needed.
nextSteps: Pick where logs/metrics go (Application Insights, Log Analytics, Event Hub).
Apply logging policies consistently and avoid logging sensitive data.
